price: 50. Ee u carara xagga7 Alle, waxaan idiin ahay dige cad ka yimid Xaggiisa.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: 7. Waxaa loola jeedaa u laabta oo ka magan gala gaalnimo iyo denbi falid si aad uga badbaaddaan ciqaabkiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
